title: Brahmos missile storage site in India’s Beas region destroyed in ‘Operation Bunyan-um-Marsoos’: state media - DAWN.COM
content:
The Pakistani military has destroyed a storage site of the Brahmos missiles in India’s Beas region as part of its retaliatory operation called “Bunyan-um-Marsoos”, state media outlets PTV News and Radio Pakistan reports quoting security sources.

“Bunyan-um-Marsoos” translates as concrete structure or firm foundation.

The statement said that attacks were ongoing at more places in India.

It added that an air base in Udhampur and an airfield in Pathankot were also destroyed.

“All those bases in India which were used to attack Pakistani people and mosques are being targeted.”
